response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. This price reflects the significant benefits and long-term advantages it offers, while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your business operations.", "product_price": 1150000}
